page.title: 10FARMING IN OUR AREA
page.content: THE SMALLEST FARM IS {HILLHEAD,}IT IS 40 ACRES.THEY GROW BARLEY AND KEEP ANIMALS.THEY HAVE CATTLE(DEVON),SHEEP(SUFFOLK CROSS),HORSES,GOATS,DOGS AND CATS.THEY USE A TRACTOR,BAILER,ROLLER AND TRAILER,WHICH ARE REPAIRED BY CONTRACT.NORSK HYDRO FERTILISER IS USED.FOR FEED BARLEY,OATS AND SPILLERS NUTS.THE CROPS GO TO A SEED MERCHANT AND THE ANIMALS TO A SLAUGHTERHOUSE. THE BIGGEST FARM IS{RIDDELL}WHICH IS 1753 ACRES.THEY GROW BARLEY,RAPE,POTATOES,TURNIPS,OATS AND HAY.THEY KEEP CATTLE (CHAROLAIS,HEREFORD,BLUE GRAYS) SHEEP (SUFFOLK,GREYFACE),HORSES,HENS,CATS AND DOGS.THEY REPAIR THEIR OWN MACHINERY OR USE A LOCAL DEALER.THEY SELL THEIR CROPS TO GRAIN DEALERS.THE CATTLE MARKET IS IN HAWICK.
